snippet.title: Rift Rangers Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Ranger, the Master Brain is besieging our dimension! We are expecting endless hordes of monsters and we are sending you in to prevent the assault.

AVAILABLE ON STEAM EARLY ACCESS DECEMBER 8, 2022!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2172120/Rift_Rangers/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=earlyaccess

Rift Rangers is a sentai themed casual rogue-lite where you defend against an endless horde of dimensional creatures. Construct and upgrade your defensive turrets while dodging enemies! Find the right combination of turrets and upgrades to become an impenetrable fortress!

REFUSE TO DIE!
